entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to light snow before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then northwest 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the morning then steady.
entry.summary: Light snow ending in the morning then mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light near noon. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the morning then steady. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 14 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
